p: The potato chips were packaged and kept in an electric oven at 60 ± 1°C for 60 days; the variations in PV and AV of the extracted oils from stored potato chips were determined according to the AOCS methods (A.O.C.S, 1998) on days 15, 30, 45, and 60. The PV was reported as milliequivalents of oxygen per kilogram of sample (meq/kg).
